release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Version 13.3:

    • Fix: In Thread pane, enabling 'Color Recipent/.../etc' Fonts option did not override unread message font color in Dark Theme. Fixed.
    • Fix: In Thread pane, enabling 'Black Row Fonts' option did not override unread message font color in Dark Theme. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Version 13.1:

    • Fix: OK button did not close color picker palette when "Apply color to all identities" was enabled. Fixed.
    • Fix: In Folder pane, enabling Color Account/Folder Font options did not override account/inbox new mail colors. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Version 13.0:

    • New: Account Colors is now fully compatible with Thunderbird's Light and Dark themes.
    • New: Can now color all columns in Folder and Thread Panes.
    • New: 'Color Unread/Total/Size Fonts' option for Folder Pane.
    • New: 'Black Row Fonts' option for Folder & Thread Panes.
    • New: 'White Row Fonts' option for Folder & Thread Panes.
    • New: 'Light Pane Background' option for Folder & Thread Panes.
    • New: 'Dark Pane Background' option for Folder & Thread Panes.
    • New: 'Black Header Labels' option for Message Pane/Tab/Window.
    • New: 'White Header Labels' option for Message Pane/Tab/Window.
    • New: 'White Header Labels' option for Compose Window.
    • New: 'White Field Fonts' option for Compose Window.
    • New: 'Light Field Backgrounds (on hover or focus) ' option for Compose Window.
    • New: 'Dark Field Backgrounds (on hover or focus) ' option for Compose Window.

    • Chg: On first installation 'Reinstate default hover and select styles' option is now enabled for both Folder and Thread Panes.
    • Chg: On first installation 'Reinstate default hover style (on From menu)' option is now enabled for Compose Window.
    • Chg: Hover style on From menu in Compose Window changed to Thunderbird standard white font on blue background.
    • Chg: Attachments container in Compose Window is now lightly shaded by default.
    • Chg: 'White Field Background' option replaced bynamed to 'Light Field Background' for Compose window..

    • Fix: Tree lines in Folder Pane did not always contrast with row background color. Fixed.
    • Fix: Hover and select bars in Folder and Thread Panes were not visible with themes enabled. Fixed.
    • Fix: Darker (unfocused) select bars in Folder and Thread Pane was not visible with themes enabled. Fixed.
    • Fix: Color picker RGB number boxes allowed values <0 or >255. Fixed.
    • Fix: Color picker HSV H number box allowed values <0 or >360. Fixed.
    • Fix: Color picker HSV S&V number boxes allowed values <0 or >100. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Version 12.1:

    • Fix: Under heavy load on startup attempted to color folder/thread trees before Thunderbird finished parsing CSS style sheets. Fixed.
    • Fix: Under heavy load on startup attempted to color folder/thread trees before Thunderbird finished initializing tree views. Fixed.
    • Fix: Sometimes on startup folder/thread trees were not colored until a folder was selected. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Version 12.0:

    • New: New version compatible with Thunderbird 68.0.
    • New: 'Automatic background color' now works for identities as well as for accounts.

    • Chg: Redesigned and updated to be compatible with Thunderbird 68.0.
    • Chg: Removed XBL bindings for custom <colorpicker> and <scale> elements.
    • Chg: Replaced XUL <colorpicker> elements by custom designed palettes.
    • Chg: Replaced XUL <scale> elements by HTML <input type="range"> elements.
    • Chg: Replaced all references to tree.treeBoxObject by references to tree.
    • Chg: Replaced all references to tree.boxobject by references to tree.
    • Chg: Replaced all references to anonymous elements by references to equivalent HTML elements.
    • Chg: Added Javascript event listeners for OK and Apply buttons.
    • Chg: Moved CSS rules for options from inline style attributes into separate CSS file.
    • Chg: Adjusted row spacing and increased row spacing (heights and top margins).
    • Chg: No longer compatible with Thunderbird pre-68.0 versions.
    • Chg: Compatible with CompactHeader add-on version 3.0.0beta3.

    • Fix: 'Automatic background color' did not work for identities. Fixed.
    • Fix: 'Color Attachment Font' option did not color attachment file sizes. Fixed.
    • Fix: 'Black Header Labels' option did not blacken attachment total file size. Fixed.
    • Fix: 'Black Field Fonts' option did not blacken attachment file sizes. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Version 11.1:

    • New: Improved styling of Compose Windows.
    • New: Improved compatibility with Thunderbird 60 and dark themes.
    • New: Many small improvements to work better with Thunderbird 60 and dark themes.
    • New: Options to reinstate default hover and select styles in Folder and Thread Panes.
    • New: Options to set From font style and font size in Message Pane/Tab/Window.
    • New: Option to color From background in Message Pane/Tab/Window.
    • New: Option to make all Header Label fonts black in Compose Pane.
    • New: Option to color Attachment fonts in Compose Pane.
    • New: Option to color To/Cc/Bcc fonts in Compose Pane.
    • New: Option to make all input Field fonts black in Compose Pane.
    • New: Option to reinstate default hover style on From menu in Compose Pane.

    • Chg: Improved appearance of From popup menu in Compose Pane.
    • Chg: Removed option to make only To/Cc/Bcc fonts black in Compose Pane.
    • Chg: White Fields Background option is now only applied on hover or focus.
    • Chg: More use of CSS to handle ordering dependencies when styling Compose Pane.
    • Chg: Incompatible with versions prior to Thunderbird 31.0.
    • Chg: Compatible with Color Folders add-on version 1.1 (TB31).
    • Chg: Compatible with CompactHeader add-on versions 2.0.9-2.1.6 (TB31-TB60).
    • Chg: Compatible with Show InOut add-on version 1.2.1 (TB31-TB60).

    • Fix: Hover indicator did not show in Folder or Thread Panes (TB60). Fixed.
    • Fix: Hover indicator did not show on odd rows in Folder or Thread Panes (TB31-TB52). Fixed.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Version 9.0:     • New: Added Color Subject Background option for Compose Window.     • New: Added Color To/Cc/Bcc Background option for Compose Window.     • New: Added Color Attachment Background option for Compose Window.     • New: Added White Default Field Backgrounds option for Compose Window (instead of light gray in TB31).     • New: Added Black To/Cc/Bcc Fonts option for Compose Window (stops red highlighting of new addresses).     • New: Added Account Colors Options... menu item to Tools menu in Message Windows.     • New: Added Account Colors Options... menu item to Tools menu in Compose Windows.     • Chg: Removed Color Header Field Backgrounds option for Compose Window.     • Chg: Moved Account Colors Options... menu item below Account Settings on Tools menu.     • Chg: Added separators and improved layout of options in Options dialog.     • Chg: Updated language translations (will need further update).     • Fix: Color Header Background option also colored header field backgrounds in TB31. Fixed.     • Fix: Color Header Field Backgrounds option had no effect in TB31. Fixed.     • Fix: Border color of Subject box when hovering or focused was incorrect in Compose Window in TB31. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Version 8.2:     • Chg: Account Colors is now compatible with the CompactHeader add-on (Version 1.4.6 or later).     • Chg: Options dialog is now displayed in non-modal window when invoked directly from Tools menu.     • Fix: Message Window font/background coloring options did not work correctly with IMAP accounts. Fixed.     • Fix: Compose Window background coloring options did not work correctly with Thunderbird 31. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Version 7.0:     • New: Added Account Colors Options... menu item in Thunderbird Tools sub-menu.     • New: Added Apply button in Options dialog to apply setting changes without exiting.     • New: Renamed Color Header Background option to Color Header Field Backgrounds option for Compose Window.     • New: Added new Color Header Background option to control color of static background in Compose Window.     • Chg: Added Color From Font and Color From Background options for Compose Window.     • Chg: Removed Color From Identity and Color From Menu options for Compose Window.     • Chg: Improved styling of From menulist and dropdown menu in Compose Window.     • Chg: Improved styling of Subject field in Compose Window.     • Chg: Improved styling of Attachment field in Compose Window.     • Chg: Updated language translations.     • Fix: Vertical scroll bar obscured Bkgd color pickers in Account/Identity Colors options tab. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Version 6.10:     • Chg: Option to indication new mail by bold/underline now applies to all folders (not just Inbox's).     • Chg: Updated to be compatible with Thunderbird 24.*.     • Fix: In Thread Pane, selection bars not displayed correctly when selecting messages on dark row stripes. Fixed.     • Fix: In Thread Pane, increased row spacing only based on Subject font size, not From font size. Fixed.     • Fix: In Folder Pane, highlighting not working correctly when dragging messages into folders (XP, Linux, Mac OS X). Fixed.     • Fix: In Options dialog, too much white space to right of Bkgd buttons in Account/Identity Colors tab. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Version 6.9:     • Chg: Updated language translations (but will need further update).     • Chg: Updated to be compatible with Thunderbird 23.*.     • Fix: Coloring in Folder Pane and Thread Pane no longer works with Thunderbird 22.0. Fixed     • Fix: Larger fonts for Account name in Folder Pane incorrectly positioned. Fixed.     • Fix: Larger fonts for Subject and From fields in Thread Pane incorrectly positioned. Fixed.     • Fix: Coloring of From: field in Compose Window no longer works with Thunderbird 22.0. Fixed.     • Fix: Select bar in From: drop-down menu in Compose Window incorrectly sized. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Version 6.8:

    • New: Options to apply bold font or underline to Accounts and Inboxes containing new mail.

    • Chg: Updated language translations (but will need further update).

    • Fix: Highlight select bar did not match operating system style on Windows Vista/7/8. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Version 6.6:     • New: Options to retain Thunderbird's default background colors if White selected.     • Chg: Removed coloring of To:, Cc:, etc label backgrounds in compose window.     • Chg: Updated language translations (but will need further update).     • Chg: Updated to be compatible with Thunderbird 20.*.     • Fix: Accesses to nsISupportsArray deprecated interface no longer work. Fixed.     • Fix: Opening message in new window caused error message in error console. Fixed.     • Fix: Handling of sent and IMAP received messages not documented in source code. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Version 6.5:

    • Fix: Color picker 'OK' buttons did not work in Version 6.4. Fixed.
    • Fix: Missing message colors with 'Open message in: a new message window' option. Fixed.
    • Fix: Incorrect message colors with 'Open message in: an existing message window' option. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Version 6.1:     • New: After initial installation, all existing accounts/identities have black font on white background.     • New: After adding a new account/identity, the new account/identity has black font on white background.     • Chg: Updated language translations and added Finnish and Italian translations.     • Chg: Updated to be compatible with Thunderbird 14.*.     • Fix: Adding an account, after removing an account, results in incorrect coloring of new account. Fixed. New features, changes and fixes in Version 6.2:     • New: Option to color font in Date/Size/Account/Priority fields in thread pane.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Version 6.0:     • New: Any color can be selected for font and background colors for accounts and identities.     • New: Color pickers select colors using RGB/HSV sliders as well as original color palettes.     • New: Color pickers have checkbox to enable/disable automatic background color.     • New: Options to set font style and font size in From field in thread pane.     • New: Option to color font in From field in thread pane.     • New: Local Folders are colored on first installation to assist new users.     • Chg: Increased number of accounts/identities from 40 to 60.     • Chg: Updated language translations and added French and Portuguese translations.     • Chg: Updated to be compatible with Thunderbird 13.*.     • Fix: Incompatibility with Color Folders add-on if Account Colors installed afterwards. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Version 5.0:     • Chg: Substantially re-designed the way that coloring and styling are applied in order         to minimize incompatibilities with operating system themes and Thunderbird themes.     • Chg: Darker Select Bar options now available for all operating systems.     • Chg: Show Row Stripes option now available for all operating systems.     • Chg: Hide Row Stripes option removed.

release_notes.en-US: New features, changes and fixes in Release 4.3:     • New: Translations for German, Spanish, Swedish and Chinese languages.     • Chg: Updated to be compatible with Thunderbird 9.*.     • Fix: Long account/identity names cause boxes in Options dialog to extend. Fixed.     • Fix: Flickering artifact in top left corner when message opened in tab (Mac OS X). Fixed.     • Fix: Classic theme makes text under selection bars unreadable (Win 7/Vista). Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Release 3.3:

    • New: Options to enable/disable font style and font size changes.

    • Chg: Increase row spacing now applies even if font size is disabled.
    • Chg: Updated to be compatible with Thunderbird 3.1.

    • Fix: Thunderbird ran very slowly and used lots of CPU. Fixed.
    • Fix: Opening and closing messages in tabs was very slow. Fixed.
    • Fix: Coloring of messages in thread pane stopped working. Fixed.
    • Fix: Colored selection bar for tagged messages was not displayed. Fixed.
    • Fix: Opening dialog box several times caused duplicated CSS rules. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in Release 3.2:

  • New: Font Style can be set for From Identity.
  • New: Font Size can be set for From Identity.

  • Chg: Highlight From Identity option removed (Identity can now be styled/sized).


New features, changes and fixes in Release 3.1:

  • New: Allows coloring and styling of Newsgroup accounts.
  • New: Allows coloring and styling of Blog & Newsfeed accounts (as in Release 2.0).
  • New: Color settings are automatically migrated from Release 2.0 and Release 3.0.
            (install Release 3.1, open Options dialog, click OK to complete migration)

  • Chg: Font sizes 10 & 11 added for folder/thread/message panes and compose window.

  • Fix: Conflicts with Show InOut 0.602 and Address Book Display Name 0.2.2a. Fixed.


New features, changes and fixes in Release 3.0:

  • New: Account Colors - Colors can be set for individual identities as well as accounts.
  • New: Thread Pane - Subject Fonts can be styled and sized.
  • New: Thread Pane - Subject Fonts and Message Backgrounds can be colored.
  • New: Thread Pane - Colors based on folder account or message header account.
  • New: Thread Pane - Increase Row Spacing option according to subject font size.
  • New: Thread Pane - Coloring of messages now works for Global Inbox.
  • New: Compose Window - Color From Identity option colors identity font and background.
  • New: Compose Window - Color From Menu option colors identities in drop-down list.
  • New: Compose Window - Highlight From Identity option bolds and enlarges identity.

  • Chg: Options Dialog - Window is now smaller and has a tabbed interface.
  • Chg: Account Colors - Number of accounts/identities that can be colored increased to 40.
  • Chg: Compose Window - Color From Identity option is now independent of other options

  • Fix: Main Menu - menu bar greyed out after installation. Fixed.
  • Fix: Options Dialog - Items are scrambled/overlapping on lower resolution screens. Fixed.
  • Fix: Folder Pane - Darker Select Bar option sometimes cannot be disabled. Fixed.
  • Fix: Folder Pane - No Bold on Unread option sometimes cannot be enabled. Fixed.
  • Fix: Thread Pane - Hide Stripes option sometimes cannot be enabled. Fixed.
  • Fix: Message Pane - Uncaught error when message header contains unknown account. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
New features, changes and fixes in this release:

  • New: Account Colors - Colors can be set for individual identities as well as accounts.
  • New: Thread Pane - Subject Fonts can be styled and sized.
  • New: Thread Pane - Subject Fonts and Message Backgrounds can be colored.
  • New: Thread Pane - Colors based on folder account or message header account.
  • New: Thread Pane - Increase Row Spacing option according to subject font size.
  • New: Thread Pane - Coloring of messages now works for Global Inbox.
  • New: Compose Window - Color From Identity option colors identity font and background.
  • New: Compose Window - Color From Menu option colors identities in drop-down list.
  • New: Compose Window - Highlight From Identity option bolds and enlarges identity.

  • Chg: Options Dialog - Window is now smaller and has a tabbed interface.
  • Chg: Account Colors - Number of accounts/identities that can be colored increased to 40.
  • Chg: Compose Window - Color From Identity option is now independent of other options

  • Fix: Main Menu - menu bar greyed out after installation. Fixed.
  • Fix: Options Dialog - Items are scrambled/overlapping on lower resolution screens. Fixed.
  • Fix: Folder Pane - Darker Select Bar option sometimes cannot be disabled. Fixed.
  • Fix: Folder Pane - No Bold on Unread option sometimes cannot be enabled. Fixed.
  • Fix: Thread Pane - Hide Stripes option sometimes cannot be enabled. Fixed.
  • Fix: Message Pane - Uncaught error when message header contains unknown account. Fixed.

release_notes.en-US:
Updated to be compatible with Thunderbird 3.0 final release.

New features, changes and fixes in this release:

  -  New:  Colors applied can be based either on the account in which the folder is located
               or on the account referenced in the message header.
  -  New:  Colors are also applied to messages in Tabs.
  -  New:  Added 'Darker Select Bar' option for thread pane (message list).
  -  Chg:  The option for 'Hide Tree Lines' has been changed to 'Show Tree Lines'.
  -  Chg:  All options can now be applied without restarting Thunderbird.
  -  Fix:  Issues with 'Bold on Unread Subject' and 'Bold on Unread From' options have been fixed.
  -  Fix:  All reported and known bugs have been fixed.
